Description.zh-cn: HANA所在主节点ECS的主机名
Description.en: HANA master node ECS hostname

ConstraintDescription.zh-cn: 长度为 2-13 个字符，允许使用大小写字母、数字或连字符(-)，但不能以连字符(-)开头或结尾。
ConstraintDescription.en: The length is 2-13 characters,can starting with a capital or lowercase letter,and can contain numbers,or -,but can't starting with - or end with -

Description.en: HANA slave node ECS hostname

ConstraintDescription.en: The length is 2-13 characters,can starting with a capital or lowercase letter,and can contain numbers,or -,but can't starting with - or end with -

Description.en: SAP NetWeaver master node ECS hostname

Description.zh-cn: ECS (root用户登录密码)
Description.en: ECS root passowrd

ConstraintDescription.zh-cn: 8-30个字符，且同时包含三项（大写字母，小写字母，数字或特殊符号）
ConstraintDescription.en: 8-30 characters,include(capital letter,lowercase letter,numbers or special characters)

Description.zh-cn: 系统盘分类：高效云盘，SSD云盘，ESSD云盘（PL1）
Description.en: System disk type: Ultra Disk,SSD disk

Description.zh-cn: 根目录大小，单位GB，容量20-500G
Description.en: / file system size,unit:GB,range:20~500G

ConstraintDescription.zh-cn: 必须输入整数，单位GB，容量20-500G
ConstraintDescription.en: Must be an integer,range:20~500G

Description.zh-cn: HANA Master和NetWeaver Master密码
Description.en: HANA and NetWeaver master password to use during installation

ConstraintDescription.zh-cn: 至少8个字符,至少包含一个数字，大写字母和小写字母，可以使用特殊字符（_,@,#,$)，但不能以数字和特殊字符开头。
ConstraintDescription.en: Must be at least 8 characters with uppercase, lowercase, and numeric values,can use special characters include(_,@,#,$),but can't staring with number and specical characters

Description.zh-cn:
1.选择机型前请先确认当前可用区下该机型是否有货，部分机型需要提前报备
2.可选机型列表
[ecs.r5.2xlarge 非认证机型 64G]
[ecs.r5.4xlarge 非认证机型 128G]
[ecs.r5.8xlarge SAP认证机型 256G]
[ecs.r6.13xlarge SAP认证机型 384G]
[ecs.se1.14xlarge SAP认证机型 480G]
[ecs.r5.16xlarge SAP认证机型 512G]
[ecs.re4.20xlarge SAP认证机型 960G]
[ecs.re4.40xlarge SAP认证机型 1920G]
[ecs.re4e.40xlarge SAP认证机型 3840G]
[ecs.ebmre6-6t.52xlarge SAP认证机型 6144G]
3.详情请参考 实例族详情
Description.en:
Instance type list
[ecs.r5.2xlarge Non-certified instance type 64G]
[ecs.r5.4xlarge Non-certified instance type 128G]
[ecs.r5.8xlarge SAP certified instance type 256G]
[ecs.r6.13xlarge SAP certified instance type 384G]
[ecs.se1.14xlarge SAP certified instance type 480G]
[ecs.r5.16xlarge SAP certified instance type 512G]
[ecs.re4.20xlarge SAP certified instance type 960G]
[ecs.re4.40xlarge SAP certified instance type 1920G]
[ecs.re4e.40xlarge SAP certified instance type 3840G]
[ecs.ebmre6-6t.52xlarge SAP certified instance type 6144G]

ConstraintDescription.zh-cn: 必须输入3个字符,可包含大写字母或数字，首位必须是大写字母
ConstraintDescription.en: 3 characters,can including capital letter or number, must starting with capital letter

Description.zh-cn: HANA SID
Description.en: HANA system ID

Description.zh-cn: HANA instance number
Description.en: HANA instance number

ConstraintDescription.en: 2 numbers,00-97

Description.zh-cn:
1. /hana/data和/hana/log文件系统所在磁盘类型：ESSD云盘、SSD云盘。
2. ESSD 云盘容量越大，可供选择的性能级别越高（460 GiB 以上可选 PL2，1260 GiB 以上可选 PL3），性能级别越高相应的费用也越高:
  •     cloud_essd PL1（单盘IOPS性能上限5万）
  •     cloud_essd PL2（单盘IOPS性能上限10万）
  •     cloud_essd PL3（单盘IOPS性能上限100万）
如何合理选择 ESSD 云盘性能级别，查看详情>
Description.en:
1. /hana/data and /hana/log file system disk type: ESSD disk,SSD disk.
2. The higher the performance level that you can select. For example, PL2 is available for an enhanced SSD of more than 460 GiB and PL3 is available for an enhanced SSD of more than 1260 GiB. A higher performance level indicates a higher fee:
  •     cloud_essd PL1(up to 50,000 IOPS per disk)
  •     cloud_essd PL2(up to 100,000 IOPS per disk)
  •     cloud_essd PL3(up to 1,000,000 IOPS per disk)
For more information about how to select the performance level of an enhanced SSD, click here>

Label.zh-cn: HANA数据卷和日志卷磁盘类型
Label.en: HANA Data And Log Volume Disk Type

Description.zh-cn: /hana/data文件系统大小，单位GB，SAP官方推荐：Size >= 1 x RAM
Description.en: /hana/data file system size,unit:GB,SAP recommendation:Size >= 1 x RAM

ConstraintDescription.en: Must be an integer,range:20~32768G

Description.zh-cn: /hana/log文件系统大小，单位GB，SAP官方推荐：[systems ≤ 512GB ] Sizeredolog = 1/2 x RAM;[systems > 512GB ] Sizeredolog(min) = 512GB
Description.en: /hana/log file system size,unit:GB,SAP recommendation:[systems ≤ 512GB ] Sizeredolog = 1/2 x RAM;[systems > 512GB ] Sizeredolog(min) = 512GB

ConstraintDescription.en: Must be an integer,range:20~32768G

ConstraintDescription.en: Must be an integer,range:20~32768G

Description.en: /usr/sap file system size,unit:GB,range:20~32768G

Description.zh-cn: 请从SAP官网下载HANA安装介质(无需解压等任何更改操作，原始包是类似51053381_part1.exe或.rar等4个包）上传至SAP HANA部署所在的OSS地域的bucket，输入以oss://开头的该目录的全路径。例：oss://{bucket_name}/hana
Description.en: Please download the HANA installation media from SAP software download center(Don't need to extract, the packages are like these:51053381_part1.exe or.rar）and upload them into OSS bucket,input the full path starting with oss://. eg: oss://{bucket_name}/hana

ConstraintDescription.en: Starting with oss.eg: oss://{bucket_name}/hana

Description.zh-cn: 请从SAP官网下载SAP NetWeaver应用的安装介质(包括Export包，需要升级的目标Kernel包，需要升级的目标HOSTAGENT，IGS，IGS helper，HANA client等软件包；无需解压等任何更改操作）上传至SAP部署所在的OSS地域的bucket，输入以oss://开头的该目录的全路径，例：oss://{bucket_name}/Application
Description.en: Please download the SAP NetWeaver installation media from SAP software download center(Don't need to extract,the packages include Export packages;target Kernel,HOSTAGENT, IGS and IGS helper packages;HANA client packages）and upload them into OSS bucket,input the full path starting with oss://. eg: oss://{bucket_name}/Application

ConstraintDescription.en: Starting with oss.eg: oss://{bucket_name}/Application
